item.title: About
item.description: Hi there, I’m Dhanapal Jayapandi. I help Amdocs make the world’s best software. Resume Github LinkedIn Twitter Website Reading list The books/articles that I find interesting or would like to read. Engineering Article: 97 Things Every Programmer Should Know Book: Refactoring: Improving the Design of Existing Code Book: Clean Architecture Book: Fundamentals of Software Architecture: An Engineering Approach Pluralsight: Secure Software Development Leadership Book: The Manager’s Path Book: Managing Humans Book: Managing the Unmanageable Book: The Making of a Manager Book: An Elegant Puzzle - Systems of Engineering Management Book: The Art of Leadership: Small things done well Finance Book: Your Money or Your Life Book: The Intelligent Investor
